titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation prohibiting the keeping of Bartholomew Faire and Sturbridge Faire.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By I.L. and W.T. for Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at the Court at Woodstocke, the fourth day of August, in the first yeere of his Maiesties Raigne of great Britaine, France and Ireland."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
